sentences.en: Election officials have rigged up speakers to provide voters with music.
sentences.cn: 负责选举的官员们已经临时安了几个喇叭，让投票者可以同时享受音乐。

sentences.en: Elections for the state governorship will be on November 25.
sentences.cn: 州长选举将于11月25日举行。

sentences.en: Felipe Gonzalez won a fourth term of office in Spain's election.
sentences.cn: 费利佩·冈萨雷斯在西班牙选举中获得第4次连任。

sentences.en: He also felt she had not behaved honorably in the leadership election.
sentences.cn: 他还认为她在领导人选举中有不端行为。

sentences.en: He declined to give any information on the Presidential election.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝透露任何有关总统选举的消息。

sentences.en: He has not yet announced whether he will stand in the election.
sentences.cn: 他尚未宣布自己是否会参选。

sentences.en: He has staked his political future on an election victory.
sentences.cn: 他把自己的政治前途押在竞选获胜上。

sentences.en: He won last month's presidential election by a landslide.
sentences.cn: 他以压倒性多数赢得上月的总统选举。

sentences.en: Kaifu threatened to dissolve the Parliament and call an election.
sentences.cn: 卡夫威胁要解散议会并举行选举。

sentences.en: The country is in the throes of a general election.
The election date had to be brought forward by two months.
sentences.cn: 选举日期必须提前两个月。

sentences.en: The election was held six months ahead of schedule.
The Labour Party won the 2001 election by a huge majority.
sentences.cn: 工党在2001年选举中以巨大优势获胜。

sentences.en: The real winners of the election, he said, were the Hungarian people.
sentences.cn: 他说，选举的真正赢家是匈牙利人民。

sentences.en: They have a more than even chance of winning the next election.
sentences.cn: 他们赢得下届选举的机会在五成以上。

sentences.en: This factor will come increasingly to the fore as election day nears.
sentences.cn: 随着选举日的临近，这一因素将愈发重要。

sentences.en: We'll face a tough fight in the upcoming election.
sentences.cn: 在即将到来的选举中，我们将面临一场恶斗。

sentences.en: Within three months of his election he was forced to resign.
sentences.cn: 他当选后不到三个月就被迫辞职。

words.tran_cn: 被选的人；特殊阶层；上帝的选民
从事选举活动；积极竞选的人
选举人；有选举权的人；总统选举人
从事选举活动；积极参加竞选

phrases.tran_cn: 提前选举；临时选举；仓促的选举

trans.tran_en: when people vote to choose someone for an official position
